title: Client Beta
body: anyone know how to fix the Beta client? I had it working awhile ago and its just stopped working now, when I update from Alpha it says their was an issue and that I need to reinstall the Alpha client, ive reinstalled the client multiple times and it hasn't fixed it

replies.body: It sounds like a recent update may have corrupted game files, so the client can't work anymore.  Unfortunately, since both clients use the same files that means a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)would be necessary.  That should fix things up, and you can download the updated client again after if you like.  Let me know if you have any questions.
ive tried reinstalling multiple times and it hasn't worked, unless there is another way to fix it I don't think I can get it to work

I have the exact same problem as IMT spirit, and have tried to reinstall as well but continue to get errors, this is only when I click upgrade the client if I say install later my client lets me get into the legacy just fine
